title: Nmoder Women's Wrap Dress Cocktail Church Wedding Midi Dress A-Line V Neck 3/4 Sleeve Casual Dresses with Pockets
description: 【Material】The Wrap Midi Dress is made of 92%Polyester+8%Elastane. Soft and stretchy fabric make you feel comfortable in all days.

【Design】The 3/4 sleeve dress for women features a V-neck cross wrap and unique high waist makes your more sexy and attractive, 3/4 sleeve design is wearable in four seasons. Side pocket designs for carrying small items but without influencing the beauty.

【Style】The 3/4 sleeve dresses features A-line version design,3/4 sleeve design is wearable in four seasons. You can pair with heels,sandals and jewelry,handbags,never out of fashion.Has multiple colors and sizes from M-3XL for you to choose, every midi dress with different colors or patterns.
【Occasion】The A line dresses for women is perfect to you can bridesmaid parties, cocktail, evening party or wedding,dances,business, church or other occasions.

【Note】Please check the size chart we provide about this casual midi dress for more details to select your size. Cold Water washing, do not soak for a long time. (Please separate the light clothes from the dark clothes before laundering)
